value.title: How school closures during COVID-19 further marginalize vulnerable children in Kenya
value.excerpt: While such learning may take place in urban areas, for many marginalized children in remote villages—including refugee children in camps as well as those living with various disabilities—learning during COVID-19 school closures is a deep challenge.

images.title: How school closures during COVID-19 further marginalize vulnerable children in Kenya

value.title: Baltimore County public schools change final grading, graduation plans due to coronavirus
value.excerpt: Final grades for middle school and some high school students in County Public Schools will be graded as “Pass/Fail," and graduation for the Class of 2020 will be held online, the school system announced Tuesday night.

value.title: Before the coronavirus pandemic, Maryland planned a $4 billion schools overhaul

Jones (D-Baltimore County) refused to leave without enacting an enormous education overhaul aimed at fixing generations of inequity in public schools.

value.title: 'Mama is tired': After school closures, some families burn out on online classes, others thrive

value.title: Ohio gamblers turning to old-school lottery favorites during coronavirus pandemic
value.excerpt: Ohio lost out on potentially tens of millions of dollars when Gov. Mike DeWine closed the state’s casinos, but the COVID-19 lockdown led many gamblers to the state lottery, which has seen an uptick is some of its more traditional games.

value.title: Iowa school district sends Wi-Fi vans into vulnerable communities as coronavirus keeps students home
value.excerpt: Over 55 million students enrolled in K-12 education have shifted to digital learning as the coronavirus pandemic prompted school closures – but online classes have presented challenges for some districts.

value.title: Small Montana schools could be first to reopen after Covid-19 closures
value.excerpt: (CNN)A one-teacher, one-room school in Montana may be among the nation's first to reopen -- as soon as Thursday -- after being closed due to Covid-19. The Cohagen Elementary School, which has kindergarten through eighth grade, will open its doors that day to its 14 students, Garfield County School Superintendent Heather Gibson told CNN.

images.title: Small Montana schools could be first to reopen after Covid-19 closures

value.title: Children Face Food Insecurity as Coronavirus Keeps Schools Closed

value.title: N.J. will keep federal coronavirus aid, and $467M is going to schools, Murphy says
value.excerpt: A day after he warned New Jersey was facing a “fiscal disaster” because of the coronavirus pandemic, Gov. Phil Murphy said Tuesday the state won’t have to return $1.8 billion in federal aid after President Donald Trump’s administration relaxed its restrictions on how the state could spend the money.

value.title: Impact of school closures on education outcomes in South Africa
value.excerpt: By mid April about 1.725 billion students globally had been affected by the closure of school and higher education institutions in response to the coronavirus pandemic. According to the UNESCO Monitoring Report, 192 countries have implemented nationwide closures, affecting about 99% of the world’s student population. This is unprecedented.

images.title: Impact of school closures on education outcomes in South Africa
